properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the XMLExportPreference (a Application or Document).

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: viewAfterExport
properties.description: If true, displays exported XML content in a specified viewer.

properties.name: preferredBrowser
properties.description: The preferred browser for viewing XML. Can return: File or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: exportFromSelected
properties.description: If true, exports XML content from the selected XML element. If false, exports the entire document.

properties.name: fileEncoding
properties.description: The file encoding type for exporting XML content.

properties.name: ruby
properties.description: If true, includes Ruby text in the exported XML content.

properties.name: excludeDtd
properties.description: If true, excludes the DTD from the exported XML content.

properties.name: copyOriginalImages
properties.description: If true, copies original images to the images subfolder.

properties.name: copyOptimizedImages
properties.description: If true, copies optimized images to the images subfolder.

properties.name: copyFormattedImages
properties.description: If true, copies formatted images to the images subfolder.

properties.name: imageConversion
properties.description: The file format to use for converted images. Note: Valid only when copy optimized images and/or copy formatted images is true.

properties.name: gifOptionsPalette
properties.description: The color palette for GIF conversion. Note: Not valid when image conversion is JPEG.

properties.name: gifOptionsInterlaced
properties.description: If true, generates interlaced GIFs. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is JPEG.

properties.name: jpegOptionsQuality
properties.description: The quality of converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid when image conversion is GIF.

properties.name: jpegOptionsFormat
properties.description: The formatting method for converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is GIF.

properties.name: allowTransform
properties.description: If true, transforms the XML using an XSLT file.

properties.name: transformFilename
properties.description: The name of the XSLT file. Note: Valid when allow transform is true. Can return: File or XMLTransformFile enumerator.

properties.name: characterReferences
properties.description: If true, replaces special characters with character references.

properties.name: exportUntaggedTablesFormat
properties.description: The export format for untagged tables in tagged stories.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLExportPreference.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
